description:
The 125 Cool-Lite™Sphere II Short Sleeve Tee Synergism is a soft and versatile merino-blend tee that provides natural performance around the globe. Made with icebreaker's lightweight and incredibly breathable Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric that helps manage moisture and keep you cool, the Sphere also features a drop-tail hem for added coverage and offset seams to reduce friction when carrying a pack. The tee's unique graphic print references the soft bend in the trail, and icebreaker's soft geometric design lines.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL™ Lyocell, sourced from eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Merino 125 Cool-Lite Sphere II SS Tee - Synergism - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool - Exclusive of decoration
